subject: My beloved How are you doing
body:
My beloved How are you doing today?,
Greetings to you and please permit me to introduce myself. i am
Mr.Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate,i am from Mexico,but living in United
State of America before i return back to Mexico i am in Mexico now,am
a very wealthy man a crude oil merchant before i was diagnosed with
esophageal cancer which has defiled all medical solutions and
according to medical experts i only have a few more months to live.
as you read this you do not have to feel sorry for me as it is a
universal truth that we all must die someday, the only problem with
mine though being that i have particularly not lived my life well in
spite of my wealth and possessions as i never really cared for anyone
(not even myself) but my business.
though i was very rich i was never generous, i was never caring about
people but only dedicated my time and resources on my business as that
was the only thing i cared about.
but now i regret all this as i now know that there is more to life!
than just accumulating all the wealth in the world as i lay helplessly
on my sick bed. if i was given a second chance to live again i sure
would live my life  different way from how i have lived it owing to
what has befallen me now.
as my last days alive are drawing closer and closer i have already
willed out most of my properties and assets to my immediate and
extended family members as well as a few close friends.
i also want my soul to be at peace with god and for him to be merciful
on me and accept my soul and to this regard i have resolved to give my
remaining funds to charity organizations as i want this to stand as
one of the last deeds i indulge in on earth before i die. though i
have already distributed money to some charity organizations, now that
my health has deteriorated so badly i can no longer continue with this
myself and also i do not trust my immediate family members or close
friends and my wife died during the September 11,2001 attack on the
world trader center in New York City, and during the period of our
marriage we could not produce any child. on this as i have once asked
immediate family members or close friends to close one of my account!
Units and distribute the funds therein to charity organizations they
greedily kept the money to themselves. Hence i am contacting you with
this as i have lost confidence in them because it is obvious they are
not contended With what i have left for them.
the last of my funds which no one knows of is a cash deposit of(Twenty
five million four hundred thousand united states dollars)
($25.4,000,000,00) stashed in one trunk boxes and declared as personal
effects of high security value which i have with a Bank. all i am
asking of you is to assist me in making the collection of this deposit
and dispatching the funds for development of the church and any
charity organizations of your choice, after keeping 20% of the funds
for yourself and your family.
Please contact me as soon as you get this email if you are capable and
sincere to handle this project! Section on my behalf so i can forward
you with all relevant documents necessary for the claims and the name
of the firm where the funds are deposited.
god bless you as i await words from you. please inform as soon as
possible if you are not interested so i can proceed to seek for
someone else to carry out this on my behalf. find attached my
International Passport my picture on my hospital bed along with this
email for your verification.
My address Address in Mexico,  Finisterra #2315-1, Fracc. Las Aldabas,
City Juarez, Chihuahua, CP: #32545 Mexico,
tHIS IS MY ANOTHER EMAIL ADDDRESS, (
mario_raschid555@hotmail.com
)
God bless you.
Yours lovely brother
Mr.Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate

subject: Re:   My beloved How are you doing
body:
Hello Raschid Aun Nafarrate,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition and the challenges you're facing. It's indeed a noble thought to want to give back to society in such a significant way.

Your story is quite touching, and it's clear that you've had a change of heart regarding how you view life and wealth. It's never too late to make amends and do good in the world.

However, I must admit that I'm not sure if I'm the right person for this task. Handling such a large amount of money is a huge responsibility, and I wouldn't want anything to go wrong.

Could you perhaps provide more information on how this process would work? What steps would need to be taken? And how can we ensure that everything is done legally and ethically?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Terri

subject: Your lovely brother.Mr. Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate, attached is my International Passport and my Driver's License along with this email for your verification
body:
My beloved how are you doing?,

How are you and your family today hope all is well? I am writing this massage to let you know that your message has been received with all pleasure. First of all, I have to thank you very much for your reply.

Meanwhile am very sorry for my late response to your message due to my health condition.

I will like to work with you because I need an honest person like you who cannot betray the trust and also a person of integrity who will utilize the money according to what the money was meant for.

Please my beloved, I hardly get up now or seat down so all i needed from you is to receive this money in to your bank account and make sure, that you use this fund for charity organizations and building of church, mosque and poor privilege that is all i need from you.Meanwhile right now my situation is getting worse day by day i am in a serious pain here which is UN-bearable to me. my Director told me that i have few weeks to leave please you should act fast ok.

Honestly i want you to handle the project so that you and your family can have this 20% as a compaction for the job well done.

So i am waiting for your urgent response because i really want this money to be in your Bank account latest nest week  as i am not
sure, of being alive next week end due to the fact that my situation is worse now.

All need from you is your personal information full name full address and you telephone number your Identification
International Passport or your Driver's License for my verification.

Immediately I receive your details information as requested I will forward it to my bank where I deposited the ($25.4,000,000,00)for immediately transferring of the money in to your Bank account so that you will start the project immediately Please my Dear, you should act fast because Right now I am in serious pain here is one of the nurse in this hospital that is helping me in writing this messages to you.

And My Doctor told me now that i will not last much longer but i have been praying you should all so help me to pray for God to keep me alive for more days because according to Doctor there is no other hope of survival on my side and i am doing this to make sure that you receive this money in your account before i join my ancestors

attached is my International Passport and my Driver's License along with this email for your verification

Thanks, and God bless you and your family.

Your lovely brother.

Mr. Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate,

subject: Re: Your lovely brother.Mr. Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate, attached is my International Passport and my Driver's License along with this email for your verification
body:
Hello Mr. Mario Raschid Aun Nafarrate,

I'm so sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be really tough for you. I hope you're getting the best care possible.

Your message is quite touching and it's admirable that even in your current state, you're thinking about helping others. Charity work is indeed a noble cause and I appreciate your intentions.

However, I'm a bit confused about the details of this project. Could you please explain more about what exactly this project entails? What kind of charity work are we talking about here? And how would the funds be used?

Also, I'd like to know more about how you came across my contact information and why you chose me for this task. It's not every day that one gets such an opportunity, so I'm curious to know more.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Terri
